inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma

inclusion.criterion: CD19 or CD20 expression on Reed-Sternberg cells
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Pericardial fluid was kappa light chain restricted CD10 positive monotypic B cells expressing FMC-7, CD19, CD20

inclusion.criterion: at least one prior chemotherapy-containing regimen
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma

exclusion.criterion: urgent therapy due to tumor mass effects or spinal cord compression
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: anti-CD20 or anti-CD19 antibody products in the past 30 days prior to CAR T-cell infusion
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and was found incidentally to have a large pericardial effusion.
